abstrac: Trusted expertise that brings your web, mobile and software projects to life.
bio:
We have over 35 years of development experience in delivering performant and secure high quality software products. We have worked with businesses both large and small delivering everything from microsites to full blown web applications, so you can be sure that your project is in safe hands.

Sam Sheppard (Co-founder / Developer)
Sam is a senior fullstack software engineer with a drive to keep up to date on current trends and best practices. With over 14 years of experience, he has a history of producing secure, performant and scalable systems in .Net & JavaScript. Having worked with PureGym, Landmarc, L3 Commercial Aviation, Fitness First and many more he strives to take a client's vision to generate a set of achievable requirements and provide quality and maintainable solutions.

Carl Saunders (Co-founder / Developer)
Carl has been developing software for over 20 years, specialising in front-end development, especially using JavaScript. He's a developer with a passion for following best practices and good standards, combining this with the discipline and ability to deliver software solutions to the highest standard.

He's worked for multiple clients, small to large including Merrill Lynch, Carlsberg, News International, Fitness First and Hitachi Data Systems, so understands the importance of software in a business context. He’s able to see the business needs and write functional code that is easy to maintain.

My first love is caricature and humorous illustration including cartooning, comic books and comic strips.

I am also an award-winning Illustrator/ Graphic Artist with extensive experience in Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator & Flash as well as freehand drawing skills. I have over 15 years of

If selected for the project, I would like to begin with an email followed up with phone call conference to discuss the particulars of your project Including the most cost effective way to get the best result-including various mediums and styles.
In this digital age, there are many options which can save time & money while delivering an equal or superior product to "hand painted original" art. Though I am happy to provide original hand drawn/ painted art if desired.
.  From there, I would like to map out a strategy agreeable to your schedule requirements regarding payments, roughs, revisions and final art.
